body: Static electric and magnetic fields; solutions to static field problems, Maxwell's equations; electromagnetic waves; boundary conditions; engineering applications.(Credits: 4)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 210 or E E 315 ; MATH 230)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 330: Engineering Electromagnetics
